help.new: Choose New User if you have never used the program before and have no saved data. This will delete all previous scores and essays you or another user saved on this computer.
help.local: Choose Local User if you have already used the program on this computer. This will save today's scores and essays with your previous scores and essays saved on this computer.
help.disk: Choose Disk User if you have used the program on this computer or on a different computer and have your data stored on a disk. Your disk will replace all previous scores and essay you or another user saved on this computer.
help.exit: Choose Exit Program to exit the Program.
